page.title: 01Middleton.
page.content: The Location And Main Features Of Middleton. Middleton is located on the south side of Leeds and is on the very edge of the city.Our area is classed as an urban area but on the boundary of Middleton lie open fields.Therefore we have a mixture of town and semi rural life. The main housing estate and a great many of the buildings were built in the 1920's and are therefore now over 60yrs old.Most of the houses are owned by Leeds City Council,but there are a tiny number of private housing.There are a number of shops on various sites. The principle features of the area include:a)M62 b)Chloride Metal Works. c)A very large council estate. d)A number of farms. e)A main Trade Union building belongs to N.U.P.E.
